docs.lead_paragraph: Georgia's main opposition-minded television station says the European Court of Human Rights has ordered the suspension until next week of a ruling by the country's Supreme Court that hands the station to a government-friendly owner.

headline.main: ECHR Postpones Transfer of Georgia's Opposition TV
